headline: Micron Stock: How To Profit Through This Advanced Options Technique
summary: One way to take advantage of high volatility in Micron stock is through an advanced options trading technique known as a diagonal put spread.

headline: Intel’s incoming Malaysian-born CEO is the latest Fortune 500 semiconductor exec to hail from Asia
summary: Lip-Bu Tan, who was born in Malaysia and went to university in Singapore, will take over as Intel's CEO on March 18. The news sent shares up over 10%.

raw.headline: Intel’s incoming Malaysian-born CEO is the latest Fortune 500 semiconductor exec to hail from Asia
raw.summary: Lip-Bu Tan, who was born in Malaysia and went to university in Singapore, will take over as Intel's CEO on March 18. The news sent shares up over 10%.

headline: 'Magnificent 7' stocks aren't the only high-flying tech names getting hit hardest in this sell-off
